name: Clin M Vagina
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note:**  When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, record the code with metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage.

**Distant lymph nodes for all of vagina**

    Aortic, NOS:
        Lateral (lumbar)
        Para-aortic
        Periaortic
    Retroperitoneal, NOS

**Distant lymph nodes for primary in lower third of vagina**

    Pelvic lymph nodes:
        Iliac, NOS:
            Common
            External
            Internal (hypogastric)
                Obturator
                Middle sacral (promontorial) (Gerota's node)
    Pelvic lymph nodes, NOS 

**Distant lymph nodes for primary in upper two-thirds of vagina**

     Inguinal, NOS:
        Superficial inguinal (femoral)
